name: A Lost Light (Sodaro)
description:
Lumy the wisp has ventured off on their own and become lost in a frozen cave. Get Lumy out of the cave while absorbing light to keep them alive!

Music: 

  • Punch Deck - Snowfall (CC)

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrowkeys to move
  • P to Pause the game
  • R to Reset to checkpoint
  • B to start from the Beginning
  • L to Lower audio volume
  • O to Increase audio volume
